auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long

home.title: Smart dialogue with your documents
home.subtitle: Intelligently question or discuss uploaded documents
home.feature1Desc: Extract relevant information from different document formats.
home.feature2Desc: Query your documents as if you were talking to a colleague.
home.feature3Desc: Receive answers with references to relevant document parts.
home.feature4Desc: Easily find your previous searches and questions.
home.adaptiveSystem: Our system adapts to your needs, whatever your profile and functions.
home.studentDesc: Help for document research, text study, and exam preparation. Save time with better document understanding.
home.researcherDesc: Explore your scientific articles, research data, and publications more efficiently. Identify relevant information among your documents.
home.proDesc: Improve your productivity by quickly analyzing large volumes of documents. Get instant accurate answers from your professional files.
home.readyToRevolve: Ready to revolutionize your document processing?
home.startToday: Start today to explore all the benefits of our intelligent analysis technologies.

chat.title: Chat
chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. How can I help you today?
chat.botReply: I understand your request. I'm analyzing the relevant documents to provide you with the best information.
chat.errorLoadingMessages: Unable to load messages for this conversation
chat.loginToCreate: Please log in to create a conversation
chat.conversationCreatedDescription: Your new conversation has been created successfully
chat.errorCreatingConversation: Unable to create a new conversation
chat.conversationDeletedDescription: The conversation has been deleted successfully
chat.conversationRenamedDescription: The conversation has been renamed successfully
chat.micPermissionDescription: Please allow microphone access to use this feature
chat.sampleTranscription: Can you summarize this document for me?
chat.fileSizeLimit: The maximum allowed size is 10 MB
chat.fileReceivedMessage: I received your document "{fileName}". I'll analyze it to help with your questions.
chat.uploadErrorDescription: An error occurred while uploading the file
chat.loginToUpload: Please log in to upload documents

about.title: About
about.description: Discover features and file formats supported by our platform.
about.feature4: Intuitive conversation interface with your data

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: We take the security of your data very seriously.
privacy.securityDetails: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We use advanced security protocols to protect your personal information.
privacy.authDetails: We use secure authentication methods with mechanisms to protect against unauthorized access attempts.
privacy.conversationDetails: Your conversations are stored securely and are only accessible to you.
privacy.documentDetails: Documents you upload are protected and never shared with third parties without your explicit permission.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: Use our platform ethically and responsibly.
terms.rule1: Do not upload illegal content or content protected by copyright without permission.
terms.rule2: Respect the privacy of other users.
terms.rule3: Do not use the service for malicious activities.
terms.rule4: Do not create misleading or harmful content.
terms.ethicsDetails: Our platform respects the fundamental ethical principles of AI, including transparency, fairness, and privacy. We are committed to providing responsible services that contribute positively to society.
